## Plot one continues variable 
```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Distribution of BMI."
#| label: fig-bmi-histo

ggplot(post_meal_data, aes( x = BMI)) +
  geom_histogram()

```

In figure @fig-bmi-histo you can see the BMI in a histogram
